a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

div.div: Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 720 × 270 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 120 pixels | 640 × 240 pixels | 800 × 300 pixels | 1,024 × 384 pixels | 1,280 × 480 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 720 × 270 pixels, file size: 35 KB)

tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

td.div: English: Plots showing a training set and a test set from the same statistical population. Two curves are fit to the training set, one of which is an overfit. By plotting these curves with the test data, the overfitting can be seen.

tr.td: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This plot was created with Matplotlib.

pre.span: """Generate a polynomial design matrix on X of order d."""
"""Regress Y on D using least squares."""

div.style: clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#eee; border:2px solid #ddd; padding:8px; direction: ltr;
